__e: Even if I loved you, you couldn't stop me now.
I loved you, Martino, more than the rest of them, cos you were my first.
I wanted you to know now, I've loved you since the first day I met you, and I'll never stop.
My darling, I want to tell you how much I love you and how much happiness you gave me during our marriage.
He was the only man I ever loved, and now he's gone.
She's the most beautiful woman I've ever loved, and I think she knows it.
And I liked so much what you did in that cafe.
I just... love what you have done with this room...
I really loved what you had to say, and more than that, how you presented it.
